attributes.additional_details:
This is a  petition for the improvement of the former pavilion site on Llandudno pier.
For many years the site has lay abandoned and we  feel this is to the detriment of the local economy and beauty.
We would like the government to place a order on the land owner to clear the site and put it back in to use or make public their plans for the site.
This has been a long standing issue in the local community among residents where our  main industry in the town is tourism.
This issue is of  of great detriment to our town and industry income
